img_text: Pictures In History A 1943 photograph showing Hitler, a Nazis Officer, and an alien known only as "V". It is reported that the alien had to use a special gas mask because he could not breathe on Earth. Hitler captured V and used him to develop futuristic weapons such as the V-2 rocket. After the down fall of Nazis Germany, the United States captured the alien and used him to develop military weapons for the country. It is believed that V is still living today in Area 51, and continues to help the US in advancing its futuristic warfare such as cloaking devices and robotic infantry.
